channel.title: ja on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in ja on funPlantGenes

item.title: AaGSW1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: AaGSW1 Gene Name: glandular trichome–specific WRKY1 Genome: Species: Artemisia annua Functional Descriptions: We found that a trichome-specific transcription factor, AaWRKY9, positively regulates artemisinin biosynthesis by directly binding to the promoters of the artemisinin biosynthesis genes AaDBR2 and AaGSW1.

item.title: AaHD1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: AaHD1 Gene Name: HOMEODOMAIN PROTEIN 1 Genome: Species: Artemisia annua Functional Descriptions: HOMEODOMAIN PROTEIN 1 (AaHD1) is required for jasmonate-mediated glandular trichome initiation in Artemisia annua.

item.title: AaMYC2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: AaMYC2 Gene Name: MYC2 transcription factor 2 Genome: Species: Artemisia annua Functional Descriptions: The jasmonate-responsive AaMYC2 transcription factor positively regulates artemisinin biosynthesis in Artemisia annua.

item.title: AaORA
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: AaORA Gene Name: octadecanoid-derivative responsive AP2-domain Genome: Species: Artemisia annua Functional Descriptions: AaTCP15, a JA and ABA dual-responsive teosinte branched1/cycloidea/proliferating (TCP) TF, which is essential for JA and ABA-induced artemisinin biosynthesis by directly binding to and activating the promoters of DBR2 and ALDH1, two genes encoding enzymes for artemisinin biosynthesis.

item.title: AaSEP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Aannua10729S694100 Gene Symbol: AaSEP1 Gene Name: AaSEPALLATA1 Genome: Species: Artemisia annua Functional Descriptions: Identified a MADS-box transcription factor, AaSEPALLATA1 (AaSEP1), that positively regulates GST initiation.

item.title: AaTCP15
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: AaTCP15 Gene Name: aldehyde dehydrogenase 1 Genome: Species: Artemisia annua Functional Descriptions: AaTCP15, a JA and ABA dual-responsive teosinte branched1/cycloidea/proliferating (TCP) TF, which is essential for JA and ABA-induced artemisinin biosynthesis by directly binding to and activating the promoters of DBR2 and ALDH1, two genes encoding enzymes for artemisinin biosynthesis.

item.title: AaWRKY9
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: AaWRKY9 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 9 Genome: Species: Artemisia annua Functional Descriptions: Our data suggested that the AaWRKY9 protein positively regulates artemisinin biosynthesis by directly binding to the W-boxes in the promoters of DBR2 and AaGSW1 and activating their expression AaWRKY9 contributes to light- and jasmonate-mediated to regulate the biosynthesis of artemisinin in Artemisia annua.

item.title: ALDH1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: ALDH1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Artemisia annua Functional Descriptions: AaTCP15, a JA and ABA dual-responsive teosinte branched1/cycloidea/proliferating (TCP) TF, which is essential for JA and ABA-induced artemisinin biosynthesis by directly binding to and activating the promoters of DBR2 and ALDH1, two genes encoding enzymes for artemisinin biosynthesis.

item.title: ALEX1
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: None RAPdb gene ID: Os08g0456450 Gene Symbol: ALEX1 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: C3H12
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os01g68860 RAPdb gene ID: Os01g0917400 Gene Symbol: C3H12 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: CaARF9
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Capana00g000236 Gene Symbol: CaARF9 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: Demonstrate that an auxin response factor, CaARF9, has dual roles in enhancing the immune resistance to Ralstonia solanacearum infection and in retarding plant growth by repressing the expression of its target genes as exemplified by Casmc4, CaLBD37, CaAPK1b and CaRROP1.

item.title: CaASR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaASR1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: CaASR1 promotes salicylic acid- but represses jasmonic acid-dependent signaling to enhance the resistance of Capsicum annuum to bacterial wilt by modulating CabZIP63.

item.title: CaC3H14
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaC3H14 Gene Name: zinc finger CCCH domain-containing protein 14 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: CaC3H14 encoding a tandem CCCH zinc finger protein is directly targeted by CaWRKY40 and positively regulates the response of pepper to inoculation by Ralstonia solanacearum.

item.title: CaCIPK3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CA01g29520 Gene Symbol: CaCIPK3 Gene Name: CBL-interacting protein kinase 3 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: The CaCIPK3 gene positively regulates drought tolerance in pepper.

item.title: CaLOX2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Capana03g000103 Gene Symbol: CaLOX2 Gene Name: lipoxygenase 2 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: Involvement of sweet pepper CaLOX2 in jasmonate-dependent induced defence against Western flower thrips.

item.title: CaWRKY6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaWRKY6 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 6 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: CaWRKY6 transcriptionally activates CaWRKY40, regulates Ralstonia solanacearum resistance, and confers high-temperature and high-humidity tolerance in pepper.

item.title: CsCYP82D47
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TEA023255 Gene Symbol: CsCYP82D47 Gene Name: Genome: TeaPGDB V1.

item.title: CsHSFA1b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TEA030860 Gene Symbol: CsHSFA1b Gene Name: Camellia sinensis Heat stress factors A1b Genome: TeaPGDB V1.

item.title: CsHSFA1d
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa3G008920 Gene Symbol: CsHSFA1d Gene Name: heat-shock transcription factor HSFA1d Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Report that heat shock induces cold acclimation in cucumber seedlings, via a process involving the heat-shock transcription factor HSFA1d.

item.title: CsHSFA2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TEA023633 Gene Symbol: CsHSFA2 Gene Name: Camellia sinensis Heat stress factors A2 Genome: TeaPGDB V1.

item.title: CsJAZ1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TEA001681.1 Gene Symbol: CsJAZ1 Gene Name: Genome: TeaPGDB V1.

item.title: CsJAZ6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsJAZ6 Gene Name: Camellia sinensis JASMONATE-ZIM DOMAIN6 Genome: TeaPGDB V1.

item.title: CsKPI1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsKPI1 Gene Name: Kunitz protease inhibitor 1 Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: Under Ectropis oblique attack, CsKPI1 expression and jasmonic acid (JA) levels were more abundant in both insect-damaged leaf tissues and undamaged neighboring leaves.

item.title: CsMYC2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ciclev10019730m Gene Symbol: CsMYC2 Gene Name: Genome: Citrus sinensis cv.

item.title: CsWAKL08
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cs9g14540 Gene Symbol: CsWAKL08 Gene Name: Wall-associated receptor-like kinase 8 Genome: Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsWAKL08, a pathogen-induced wall-associated receptor-like kinase in sweet orange, confers resistance to citrus bacterial canker via ROS control and JA signaling.

item.title: CYP94C2b
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os12g05440 RAPdb gene ID: Os12g0150200 Gene Symbol: CYP94C2b Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: EFA27;OsClo5
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os04g43200 RAPdb gene ID: Os04g0511200 Gene Symbol: EFA27 OsClo5 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: EG1;GY1
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os01g67430 RAPdb gene ID: Os01g0900400 Gene Symbol: EG1 GY1 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: Fir1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc12g099830 Gene Symbol: Fir1 Gene Name: Fls2/Fls3-interacting receptor-like cytoplasmic kinase 1 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Identified the tomato Fls2/Fls3-interacting receptor-like cytoplasmic kinase 1 (Fir1) protein that is involved in PTI triggered by flagellin perception.

item.title: FtBPM3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FtPinG0808645400 Gene Symbol: FtBPM3 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Fagopyrum tataricum Functional Descriptions: FtBPM3 modulates the orchestration of FtMYB11-mediated flavonoids biosynthesis in Tartary buckwheat.

item.title: FvJAZ12
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FvH4_1g09690 Gene Symbol: FvJAZ12 Gene Name: jasmonate-ZIM domain 12 Genome: Fragaria_vesca.

item.title: FvLOX3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FvH4_6g34960 Gene Symbol: FvLOX3 Gene Name: lipoxygenase 3 Genome: Species: Fragaria vesca Functional Descriptions: FvMPK6 phosphorylates FvJAZ12 at the amino acid residues S179 and T183 adjacent to the PY residues, thereby attenuating its nuclear accumulation and relieving its repression for FvMYC2, which acts to control the expression of lipoxygenase 3 (FvLOX3), an important gene involved in JA biosynthesis and a diverse array of cellular metabolisms.

item.title: FvMPK6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FvH4_1g00480 Gene Symbol: FvMPK6 Gene Name: mitogen protein kinase 6 Genome: Fragaria_vesca.

item.title: FvMYC2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FvH4_5g22100 Gene Symbol: FvMYC2 Gene Name: transcription factor MYC2-like Genome: Fragaria_vesca.

item.title: GaJAZ1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cotton_A_11862 Gene Symbol: GaJAZ1 Gene Name: Genome: Gossypium hirsutum L.

item.title: GbWRKY1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GbWRKY1 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 1 Genome: Species: Gossypium barbadense Functional Descriptions: Our data suggest that GbWRKY1 is a critical regulator mediating the plant defense-to-development transition during V.

item.title: Gh4CL3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Gh4CL3 Gene Name: Cotton 4-coumarate-CoA ligase 3 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cotton 4-coumarate-CoA ligase 3 (Gh4CL3) enhanced plant resistance to Verticillium dahliae by promoting jasmonic acid signaling-mediated vascular lignification and metabolic flux.

item.title: GhAOC2A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ghir_A08G004050.1 Gene Symbol: GhAOC2A Gene Name: allene oxide cyclase 2 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Expression analysis of the GhAOC2 gene in HT-sensitive line (H05) and HT-tolerant line (84021) anthers at TS under NT and HT.

item.title: GhAOC2D
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ghir_D08G004260.1 Gene Symbol: GhAOC2D Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Expression analysis of the GhAOC2 gene in HT-sensitive line (H05) and HT-tolerant line (84021) anthers at TS under NT and HT.

item.title: GhCDPK28-A10
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A10G086300 Gene Symbol: GhCDPK28-A10 Gene Name: Genome: genomes of G.

item.title: GhCPK33
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A01G0621 Gene Symbol: GhCPK33 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhCPK33 Negatively Regulates Defense against Verticillium dahliae by Phosphorylating GhOPR3.

item.title: GhCPK33
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A04G0148 Gene Symbol: GhCPK33 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhCPK33 Negatively Regulates Defense against Verticillium dahliae by Phosphorylating GhOPR3.

item.title: GhCPK33
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A13G1164 Gene Symbol: GhCPK33 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhCPK33 Negatively Regulates Defense against Verticillium dahliae by Phosphorylating GhOPR3.

item.title: GhCPK33
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D01G2360 Gene Symbol: GhCPK33 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhCPK33 Negatively Regulates Defense against Verticillium dahliae by Phosphorylating GhOPR3.

item.title: GhCPK33
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D05G3567 Gene Symbol: GhCPK33 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhCPK33 Negatively Regulates Defense against Verticillium dahliae by Phosphorylating GhOPR3.

item.title: GhCPK33
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D13G1455 Gene Symbol: GhCPK33 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhCPK33 Negatively Regulates Defense against Verticillium dahliae by Phosphorylating GhOPR3.

item.title: GhERF-IIb3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhERF-IIb3 Gene Name: cultivar Reba B50 ethylene-responsive transcription factor-IIb3 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhERF-IIb3 regulates the accumulation of jasmonate and leads to enhanced cotton resistance to blight diseas.

item.title: GhGPA
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhGPA Gene Name: Genome: M-1 reference genome Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: A cotton G-protein α-subunit-encoding gene (GhGPA) was isolated from Verticillium wilt-resistant Gossypium hirsutum (upland cotton) cv.

item.title: Ghir_D05G01221
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ghir_D05G01221 Gene Symbol: Ghir_D05G01221 Gene Name: Genome: G.

item.title: GhJAZ2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D06G0810 Gene Symbol: GhJAZ2 Gene Name: jasmonate2 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhJAZ2 attenuates cotton resistance to biotic stresses via the inhibition of the transcriptional activity of GhbHLH171.

item.title: GhLac1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhLac1 Gene Name: Genome: genomes of G.

item.title: GhOPR3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D05G0339.1 Gene Symbol: GhOPR3 Gene Name: 12-oxophytodienoate reductase3 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhCPK33 phosphorylates GhOPR3 at threonine-246, leading to decreased stability of GhOPR3, which consequently limits JA biosynthesis.

item.title: GhRVE2A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhRVE2A Gene Name: Genome: genomes of G.

item.title: GhRVE2D
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhRVE2D Gene Name: Genome: genomes of G.

item.title: GhSSI2-A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhSSI2-A Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cotton GhSSI2 isoforms from the stearoyl acyl carrier protein fatty acid desaturase family regulate Verticillium wilt resistance.

item.title: GhSSI2-B
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhSSI2-B Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cotton GhSSI2 isoforms from the stearoyl acyl carrier protein fatty acid desaturase family regulate Verticillium wilt resistance.

item.title: GhSSI2-C
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhSSI2-C Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cotton GhSSI2 isoforms from the stearoyl acyl carrier protein fatty acid desaturase family regulate Verticillium wilt resistance.

item.title: GhWIN2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A07G036100 Gene Symbol: GhWIN2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The cotton GhWIN2 gene activates the cuticle biosynthesis pathway and influences the salicylic and jasmonic acid biosynthesis pathways.

item.title: GhWRKY70
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhWRKY70 Gene Name: Gossypium hirsutum cultivar Zhongzhimian 2 WRKY transcription factor 70 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The cotton WRKY transcription factor GhWRKY70 negatively regulates the defense response against Verticillium dahliae.

item.title: GmERF3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmERF3 Gene Name: EREBP/AP2 transcription factor Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of the soybean GmERF3 gene, an AP2/ERF type transcription factor for increased tolerances to salt, drought, and diseases in transgenic tobacco.

item.title: GmTNL16
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.16G135500 Gene Symbol: GmTNL16 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Cloned and overexpressed Glyma.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc10g078990 Gene Symbol: HL Gene Name: Genome: Tomato Genome version SL4.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Itr_sc000462.1_g00010.1 Gene Symbol: IbNAC087 Gene Name: Genome: Sweetpotato GARDEN (Sweetpotato Genome and Resource Database ENtry) (http://sweetpotato-garden.

item.title: IbNAC1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: IbNAC1 Gene Name: NAC transcription factor 1 Genome: Species: Ipomoea batatas Functional Descriptions: IbNAC1 was constitutively expressed in root tissues and was induced earlier than sporamin following the wounding of leaves.

item.title: IbNIEL
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Itr_sc000449.1_g00025.1 Gene Symbol: IbNIEL Gene Name: NAC087-INTERACTING E3 LIGASE Genome: Sweetpotato GARDEN (Sweetpotato Genome and Resource Database ENtry) (http://sweetpotato-garden.

item.title: KAT-2A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS6A02G392400 Gene Symbol: KAT-2A Gene Name: Genome: Chinese_Spring1.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS6D02G493900LC Gene Symbol: KAT-2D Gene Name: Genome: Chinese_Spring1.

item.title: LeFAD7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LeFAD7 Gene Name: omega-3 fatty acid desaturase7 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Loss of Function of FATTY ACID DESATURASE7 (LeFAD7) in Tomato Enhances Basal Aphid Resistance in a Salicylate-Dependent Manner.

item.title: LeGGPS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LeGGPS1 Gene Name: geranylgeranyl pyrophosphate synthase1 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: LeGGPS1 was predominantly expressed in leaf tissue and LeGGPS2 in ripening fruit and flower tissue.

item.title: LeGGPS2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LeGGPS2 Gene Name: geranylgeranyl pyrophosphate synthase2 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: LeGGPS1 was predominantly expressed in leaf tissue and LeGGPS2 in ripening fruit and flower tissue.

item.title: LjbHLH7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Lj0g3v0343449 Gene Symbol: LjbHLH7 Gene Name: MeJA-responsive bHLH transcription factor Genome: Species: Lotus japonicus Functional Descriptions: MeJA-responsive bHLH transcription factor LjbHLH7 regulates cyanogenic glucoside biosynthesis in Lotus japonicus.

item.title: LjJAZ4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Lj4g3v2215580 Gene Symbol: LjJAZ4 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Lotus japonicus Functional Descriptions: The transcriptional activity of LjbHLH7 was suppressed by the interaction with the L.

item.title: LLS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb003760 Gene Symbol: LLS1 Gene Name: LETHAL LEAF SPOT1 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.

item.title: MdAAT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdAAT1 Gene Name: ALCOHOL ACYLTRANSFERASE 1 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Transcription factors MdMYC2 and MdMYB85 interact with ester aroma synthesis gene MdAAT1 in apple.

item.title: MdACS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000321088 Gene Symbol: MdACS1 Gene Name: ACC synthase 1 Genome: Malus × domestica genome GDDH13 v 1.

item.title: MdBBX37
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000157816 Gene Symbol: MdBBX37 Gene Name: Genome: Malus × domestica GDDH13 v1.

item.title: MdbHLH162
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD09G1233000 Gene Symbol: MdbHLH162 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: MdbHLH162 connects the gibberellin and jasmonic acid signals to regulate anthocyanin biosynthesis in apple.

item.title: MdBIM1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000143208 Gene Symbol: MdBIM1 Gene Name: BES1-INTERACTING MYC-LIKE PROTEIN1 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Brassinosteroid signaling regulator BIM1 (MdBIM1) integrates brassinolide and jasmonic acid signaling during cold tolerance in apple.

item.title: MdJAZ1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000452772 Gene Symbol: MdJAZ1 Gene Name: jasmonate-ZIM domain (JAZ) protein 1 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The jasmonate-ZIM domain (JAZ) proteins MdJAZ1 and MdJAZ2 negatively modulate MdABI4-improved cold tolerance in apple by interacting with the MdABI4 protein.

item.title: MdJAZ2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000757701 Gene Symbol: MdJAZ2 Gene Name: Genome: Malus × domestica GDDH13 v1.

item.title: MdMYB11
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD09G1184000 Gene Symbol: MdMYB11 Gene Name: MYB transcription factor 11 Genome: Malus x domestica Whole Genome v1.

item.title: MdMYB85
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdMYB85 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Our investigation revealed that MdMYC2 and MdMYB85 directly interacted with the promoter region of MdAAT1, thereby enhancing its transcriptional activity.

item.title: MdMYB9
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD08G1070700 Gene Symbol: MdMYB9 Gene Name: MYB transcription factor 9 Genome: Malus x domestica Whole Genome v1.

item.title: MdMYC2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000029168 Gene Symbol: MdMYC2 Gene Name: Jasmonate-Activated Transcription Factor 2 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: MdMYC2 is a homology of Arabidopsis MYC2 in apple, it has highly similarity in structure and function to the Arabidopsis MYC2.

item.title: MdSINA3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD02G1290000 Gene Symbol: MdSINA3 Gene Name: Genome: Malus × domestica GDDH13 v1.

item.title: MdTRB1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000258862 Gene Symbol: MdTRB1 Gene Name: telomere-binding protein Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: A series of biological assays showed that MdTRB1 acted as a positive modulator of anthocyanin and proanthocyanidin accumulation, and is dependent on MdMYB9.

item.title: MdVQ12
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdVQ12 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: MdVQ12, a VQ motif-containing protein, as a positive regulator of apple Valsa canker resistance.

item.title: MdZAT10
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000198015 Gene Symbol: MdZAT10 Gene Name: C2H2-type zinc finger transcription factor Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The apple C2H2-type zinc finger transcription factor MdZAT10 positively regulates JA-induced leaf senescence by interacting with MdBT2.

item.title: MfAOC2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MfAOC2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Medicago sativa Functional Descriptions: These results suggest that expression of MfAOC2 or MtAOC2 promotes biosynthesis of JA, which positively regulates expression of CBF genes and antioxidant defense under cold conditions and expression of JA downstream genes after pathogen infection, leading to greater cold tolerance and pathogen resistance.

item.title: MYC2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc08g076930 Gene Symbol: MYC2 Gene Name: Genome: Tomato Genome version SL4.

item.title: NaCOI1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NaCOI1 Gene Name: Coronatine-insensitive 1 Genome: Species: Nicotiana attenuata Functional Descriptions: NaCOI1 mediates herbivore- induced resistance in Nicotiana attenuata and reveals the role of herbivore movement in avoiding defenses.

item.title: NaMEK2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NaMEK2 Gene Name: mitogen-activated protein kinase kinase 2 Genome: Species: Nicotiana attenuata Functional Descriptions: Two mitogen-activated protein kinase kinases, MKK1 and MEK2, are involved in wounding- and specialist lepidopteran herbivore Manduca sexta-induced responses in Nicotiana attenuata.

item.title: NaMYC2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NaMYC2 Gene Name: MYC2 transcription factor Genome: Species: Nicotiana attenuata Functional Descriptions: NaMYC2 transcription factor regulates a subset of plant defense responses in Nicotiana attenuata.

item.title: NaWRKY70
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NaWRKY70 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 70 Genome: Species: Nicotiana attenuata Functional Descriptions: NaWRKY70 is a key regulator of Nicotiana attenuata resistance to Alternaria alternata through regulation of phytohormones and phytoalexins biosynthesis.

item.title: NtHD12
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NtHD12 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Nicotiana tabacum Functional Descriptions: Transcription factors NtHD9 and NtHD12 control long glandular trichome formation via jasmonate signaling.

item.title: NtHD9-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NtHD9-1 Gene Name: homeodomain leucine zipper II member 9 Genome: Species: Nicotiana tabacum Functional Descriptions: Transcription factors NtHD9 and NtHD12 control long glandular trichome formation via jasmonate signaling.

item.title: NtHD9-2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NtHD9-2 Gene Name: homeodomain leucine zipper II member 9 Genome: Species: Nicotiana tabacum Functional Descriptions: Transcription factors NtHD9 and NtHD12 control long glandular trichome formation via jasmonate signaling.

item.title: NtMYC2a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NtMYC2a Gene Name: MYC2a transcription factor Genome: Species: Nicotiana tabacum Functional Descriptions: Tobacco Transcription Factors NtMYC2a and NtMYC2b Form Nuclear Complexes with the NtJAZ1 Repressor and Regulate Multiple Jasmonate-Inducible Steps in Nicotine Biosynthesis.

item.title: NtMYC2b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NtMYC2b Gene Name: MYC2b transcription factor Genome: Species: Nicotiana tabacum Functional Descriptions: Tobacco Transcription Factors NtMYC2a and NtMYC2b Form Nuclear Complexes with the NtJAZ1 Repressor and Regulate Multiple Jasmonate-Inducible Steps in Nicotine Biosynthesis.

item.title: NtNAC028
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NtNAC028 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Nicotiana tabacum Functional Descriptions: Transcription factors NtNAC028 and NtNAC080 form heterodimers to regulate jasmonic acid biosynthesis during leaf senescence in Nicotiana tabacum.

item.title: NtNAC080
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NtNAC080 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Nicotiana tabacum Functional Descriptions: Transcription factors NtNAC028 and NtNAC080 form heterodimers to regulate jasmonic acid biosynthesis during leaf senescence in Nicotiana tabacum.
